recipesJson.name: Guava Empanada
recipesJson.author: mlNikon
recipesJson.description: This is my take on a guava empañada. Delicious sweet guava, cream cheese, and a touch of cinnamon tucked into a delicious fried shell.

reviews.text: Delicious, it hits the right notes on so many levels, thank you for this.

WOW !!    Was looking to make  a guava empanada as  I have been on a guava kick and found you mix ...   so mixed it up and fell in love with  the contrast of the guava and the cinnamon .    This is great off the shake and just gets better, really well balanced.   Curious what   Kentucky burbon does for the mix?
Excellent job very balanced recipe very impressed with how the fried dough is working in here

This is excellent right off of the shake. I will let it steep and update review. I have never had a guava empanada. Now I want to go try one. Where do I go find one?  
Seriously, the combination of sweet guava with Cap CDS, is delicious and then the fried dough and cheesecake. Delicious!  Great job.
